name: n8n-mcp-lite
description: Token-optimized MCP Server for n8n workflows - 80%+ token reduction

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const src=p.join('src','data');const dst=p.join('dist','data');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(p.join(src,f),p.join(dst,f)));console.log('Copied data files to dist/')}"
